ADMIT CARD

WORLD SKILL CENTER

ENTRANCE EXAMINATION({{doc.academic_year}})

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "entrance_exam", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Entrance Exam "}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "photo", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Photo"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Applicant Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "applicant_id", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Applicant ID"}, {"fieldname": "applicant_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Applicant Name"}, {"fieldname": "gender", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Gender"}, {"fieldname": "student_category", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Student Category"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Physical Disability:        {{doc.physical_disablity}}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "academic_year", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Academic Year"}, {"fieldname": "academic_term", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Academic Term"}, {"fieldname": "department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Venue And Slot Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "venue", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Venue"}, {"fieldname": "address", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Address"}, {"fieldname": "district", "print_hide": 0, "label": "District"}, {"fieldname": "pin_code", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Pin Code"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "slot", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Slot "}, {"fieldname": "date_of_exam", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date of Exam"}, {"fieldname": "exam_start_time", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Exam Start Time"}, {"fieldname": "exam_end_time", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Exam End Time"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Candidate Signature

"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Instruction to Candidates

1. Candidate should be physically present in the assigned exam center at least 30 minutes prior to the starting time with the Admit Card & ID Proof.

2. Candidates will not be permitted to enter the exam hall after 15min after scheduled start time of the examination and will not be allowed to leave the exam hall before the end of the examination.

3. Electronic Devices like calculators, tables, side ruler, pager and cellular phones are not allowed in the exam hall. Text books, chit papers are not allowed inside the exam hall 

4. Exam venues will not have any safe keeping facility and hence, avoid bringing back bags, mobile phones etc., If brought, it will be kept outside the exam hall at candidate’s own risk.

5. Follow the Government COVID guidelines throughout the examination.

"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

CEO Signature

"}]
html:
ADMIT CARD

WORLD SKILL CENTER

ENTRANCE EXAMINATION(WSCEE 2021)

Applicant Details: {doc.get_formatted("applicant_id")}

Entrance Exam:

Applicant Id:

Applicant Name:

Gender:

Category:

Physically Disabled:

Exam Slot Details

Slot:

Date Of Exam:

Exam Start Time:

Exam End Time:

Exam Center Details

Venue:

Address:

District:

Pincode:

Instruction to Candidates

1. Candidate should be physically present in the assigned exam center at least 30 minutes prior to the starting time with the Admit Card & ID Proof.

2. Candidates will not be permitted to enter the exam hall after 15min after scheduled start time of the examination and will not be allowed to leave the exam hall before the end of the examination.

3. Electronic Devices like calculators, tables, side ruler, pager and cellular phones are not allowed in the exam hall. Text books, chit papers are not allowed inside the exam hall 

4. Exam venues will not have any safe keeping facility and hence, avoid bringing back bags, mobile phones etc., If brought, it will be kept outside the exam hall at candidate’s own risk.

5. Follow the Government COVID guidelines throughout the examination.
name: Entrance Exam Admit Card Print Format
